consumables.name: Spirit Stone

consumables.name: Breakthrough Pill
consumables.description: Greatly increases chance of successful realm breakthrough.

artifacts.description: Increases power but slowly corrupts the wearer.

materials.description: Fabric from the heavenly realm. Incredibly valuable.

quest_items.name: Jade Key
quest_items.description: One of three keys needed to activate the ancient formation.
